activities: Personal information received from the EU primarily consists of information regarding employees.  Infrequently contact information may be obtained from people responding to market surveys or subjects participating in clinical studies.  The company's customers are healthcare providers or distributor businesses, not individuals, and therefore personal information is not obtained from customers.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU DATA PROTECTION AUTHORITIES PANEL (EU DPAs)
